chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
U: fol.System LNN
V: System
AxiomsOK: forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f))

Goal:
forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (axm : fol.Formulas LNN), Prf LNN axm f -> (forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) U g) -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarListFormula LNN axm))

Premises:
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t
freeVarListFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formulas L -> list nat
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
System = fol.System LNT : Type
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T f
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Prf : forall L : Language, fol.Formulas L -> fol.Formula L -> Set
Formulas = fol.Formulas LNT : Set
LNN2LNT_formula = fix LNN2LNT_formula (f : fol.Formula LNN) : Formula := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => equal (LNN2LNT_term t1) (LNN2LNT_term t2) | @atomic _ r ts => match r as l return (fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl l)) -> Formula) with | LT => fun t0 : fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl LT)) => translateLT t0 end ts | @fol.impH _ A B => impH (LNN2LNT_formula A) (LNN2LNT_formula B) | @fol.notH _ A => notH (LNN2LNT_formula A) | @fol.forallH _ v A =>
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
existSys : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) g -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (existH v f)) g
LNN.existSys : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g : LNN.Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (LNN.existH v f)) g
GEN : forall (L : Language) (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarListFormula L Axm) -> Prf L Axm A -> Prf L Axm (fol.forallH L v A)
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula2 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNN f) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f))
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
LNN.existE : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g : LNN.Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.existH v f) -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.impH f g) -> LNN.SysPrf T g
folLogic.existSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.existH L v f)) g
In_freeVarListFormulaE : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (F : fol.Formulas L), In v (freeVarListFormula L F) -> exists f : fol.Formula L, In v (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In f F
LNN.orSys : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g h : LNN.Formula), LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) h -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) h -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (LNN.orH f g)) h
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) < -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f
folLogic.existE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
LNN.Axm : forall (T : LNN.System) (f : LNN.Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> LNN.SysPrf T f
orSys : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (orH f g)) h
In_freeVarListFormula : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (f : fol.Formula L) (F : fol.Formulas L), In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In f F -> In v (freeVarListFormula L F)
freeVarSubAllFormula1 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula L (subAllFormula L f m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
code.codeFormulaInj : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat), (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) -> (forall R S : Relations L, codeR R = codeR S -> R = S) -> forall f g : fol.Formula L, code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f = code.codeFormula L codeF codeR g -> f = g
subFormulaNTEHelp : forall (L : Language) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) (substituteFormula L f v s)) (substituteFormula L g v s)
folLogic.impI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
folLogic.sysWeaken : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f
code.codePrfInjAxm : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat), (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) -> (forall R S : Relations L, codeR R = codeR S -> R = S) -> forall (a b : fol.Formula L) (A B : fol.Formulas L) (p : Prf L A a) (q : Prf L B b), code.codePrf L codeF codeR A a p = code.codePrf L codeF codeR B b q -> A = B
LNN2LNT_subFormula : forall (T : System) (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term LNN), SysPrf T (iffH (LNN2LNT_formula (substituteFormula LNN f v s)) (substituteFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f) v (LNN2LNT_term s)))
freeVarSubAllTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm L t m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarTerm L t) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNT) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
folLogic.Axm : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), mem (fol.Formula L) T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))
folLogic.orSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g h : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) h -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) h -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.orH L f g)) h
Prf_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall (f : fol.Formulas L) (f0 : fol.Formula L), Prf L f f0 -> Type), (forall A : fol.Formula L, P (A :: nil) A (AXM L A)) -> (forall (Axm1 Axm2 : fol.Formulas L) (A B : fol.Formula L) (p : Prf L Axm1 (fol.impH L A B)), P Axm1 (fol.impH L A B) p -> forall p0 : Prf L Axm2 A, P Axm2 A p0 -> P (Axm1 ++ Axm2) B (MP L Axm1 Axm2 A B p p0)) ->...-> forall (f13 : fol.Formulas L) (f14 : fol.Formula L) (p : Prf L f13 f14), P f13 f14 p
Prf_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : forall (f : fol.Formulas L) (f0 : fol.Formula L), Prf L f f0 -> Set), (forall A : fol.Formula L, P (A :: nil) A (AXM L A)) -> (forall (Axm1 Axm2 : fol.Formulas L) (A B : fol.Formula L) (p : Prf L Axm1 (fol.impH L A B)), P Axm1 (fol.impH L A B) p -> forall p0 : Prf L Axm2 A, P Axm2 A p0 -> P (Axm1 ++ Axm2) B (MP L Axm1 Axm2 A B p p0)) ->...-> forall (f13 : fol.Formulas L) (f14 : fol.Formula L) (p : Prf L f13 f14), P f13 f14 p
Prf_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall (f : fol.Formulas L) (f0 : fol.Formula L), Prf L f f0 -> Prop), (forall A : fol.Formula L, P (A :: nil) A (AXM L A)) -> (forall (Axm1 Axm2 : fol.Formulas L) (A B : fol.Formula L) (p : Prf L Axm1 (fol.impH L A B)), P Axm1 (fol.impH L A B) p -> forall p0 : Prf L Axm2 A, P Axm2 A p0 -> P (Axm1 ++ Axm2) B (MP L Axm1 Axm2 A B p p0)) ->...-> forall (f13 : fol.Formulas L) (f14 : fol.Formula L) (p : Prf L f13 f14), P f13 f14 p
Prf_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall (f : fol.Formulas L) (f0 : fol.Formula L), Prf L f f0 -> SProp), (forall A : fol.Formula L, P (A :: nil) A (AXM L A)) -> (forall (Axm1 Axm2 : fol.Formulas L) (A B : fol.Formula L) (p : Prf L Axm1 (fol.impH L A B)), P Axm1 (fol.impH L A B) p -> forall p0 : Prf L Axm2 A, P Axm2 A p0 -> P (Axm1 ++ Axm2) B (MP L Axm1 Axm2 A B p p0)) ->...-> forall (f13 : fol.Formulas L) (f14 : fol.Formula L) (p : Prf L f13 f14), P f13 f14 p

```coq
intros f axm Hprf Hmem.
pose proof (AxiomsOK f axm Hprf Hmem) as H.
destruct H as [Axm [Hprf' HmemAxm]].
exists Axm. split.
- exists. exact Hprf'.
- split.
  + exact HmemAxm.
  + intros v Hv.
    apply HmemAxm. exact Hv.
Qed.```

original: intros f axm Hprf Hmem. pose proof (AxiomsOK f axm Hprf Hmem) as H. destruct H as [Axm [Hprf' HmemAxm]]. exists Axm. split. - exists. apply Hprf'. - split. + apply HmemAxm. + intros v Hv. apply HmemAxm. apply Hv.
